items.summary: Fix the Dashboardâ€™s centralized daily session flow initialization so the expected modal popups (Daily Check-In / Repeat Check-In, followed by Data Logged and Brutal Friend) reliably appear when the backend status indicates they are needed, including when `userProfile` loads after `status`.

Ensure user-facing fallback behavior exists when no session modal is triggered (phase IDLE), so users can still access check-in actions (e.g., a clearly labeled manual button or entry point on the Dashboard) without relying on auto-popups.
